# Snoot

[![Global Game Jam](https://img.shields.io/badge/Global%20Game%20Jam-2020-181717.svg?logo=data:image/png;base64,)](https://globalgamejam.org/2020/games/repair-world-8)\
[![Global Game Jam](https://img.shields.io/badge/Itch.io-181717.svg?logo=itch.io)](https://fydar.itch.io/snoot) [![GitHub Pages](https://img.shields.io/badge/GitHub%20Pages-181717.svg?logo=github)](https://40219124.github.io/WorldRepair)\
[![Unity Version: 2019.3.0f6](https://img.shields.io/badge/Unity-2019.3.0f6-333333.svg?logo=unity)](https://unity3d.com/get-unity/download/archive)

Restore life to a desolate world.

[![Snoot Cover](./img/cover.png)](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=QG4aYGcsoio)

**Global Game Jam 2020**\
**Theme**: "Repair"
